divs: Sighting Detailsfirst was at family gathering 8-10 years old ant had binoculas so was looking around at clouds when I noticed a silver oval from west going east in and out of cloud over and over at least 4 times coundn't even get adult's to look. years lster around 13I and a freind were out side at night (alway's were) we noticed lites from western skies seem yo apear and move 20 30 sec. to eastern side then disapeer over 21 times . a little freeky we thought so we grab our beebe guns we stated to walk to his aunts house a few blocks away through empty lot walking west when a very intence hair standing up on the back of my neck feeling as I turned my head back a brite lite seemed fairly low hard to tell alt. so fast I just followed it out of western hem. what I saw when I was 8-10 I saw on TV a mexican news crew filmed exactly what I saw
Summary: more than one over live 1 8-9 silver disk in +out of cloud repetedly binoculars 2counted over 21 objects from west hem to eastern hem then later hair on back of neck +then flew from behind me over +freind as fast as I could follow
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Spencer
There were no other sightings in Spencer on or around June 30th 1981
